name: Telltale Batman Shadows Mode
description:
-Must own at least one episode from Batman: The Telltale Series or Batman: The Enemy Within to use this add-on.

The Batman Shadows Mode brings a captivating new look to the storied Telltale Batman games. Enhanced with hand recolored gameplay and remastered textures, replay your favorite Telltale Batman episodes and experience the twisted world of the Dark Knight in a sinister, new way.
